name: bj-sbievv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: bitri(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1, wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), w1)

-| wb(wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)), w1)

body.origin:
|- wb(wsb(s0, s1, w0), wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)))

cumulated.origin:

-| wb(wal(s1, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)), w1)

comment: Version of ~ sbie with a second nonfreeness hypothesis and shorter proof. (Contributed by BJ, 18-Jul-2023.)
